net.csvdatalib.internal

Class FileOperationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.csvdatalib.internal.FileOperationHelper

  • public class FileOperationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to help with file operations done by the database
    Author:
    Alexander Stekelenburg
    See Also:
    Database

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        public static java.io.File getFile(java.lang.String path,
                                   java.lang.Boolean mustexist,
                                   EnumFilePermissions requiredpermissions)
                            throws DatabaseIOException
        Get a file and check permissions.(Optionally check if the file exists)
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the specified file
        mustexist - if true will check if the file exists before it is returned
        requiredpermissions - the permissions the application needs to work with the file
        Returns:
        the generated File object
        Throws:
        DatabaseIOException - throws exception when file IO failed

      • writeToFile

        public static void writeToFile(java.io.File file,
                               java.lang.String[] strings)
                        throws DatabaseIOException
        Write lines to file(overwriting the existing file, adding a new line at the of the file)
        Parameters:
        file - the file created with getFile
        strings - the lines that will be written to the file
        Throws:
        DatabaseIOException - throws exception when file IO failed

      • appendFile

        public static void appendFile(java.io.File file,
                              java.lang.String[] strings)
                       throws DatabaseIOException
        Append lines to file(adding a new line at the end of the file)
        Parameters:
        file - the file created with getFile
        strings - the lines that will be appended to the file
        Throws:
        DatabaseIOException - throws exception when file IO failed

      • loadFile

        public static java.lang.String[] loadFile(java.io.File file)
                                   throws DatabaseIOException
        Load the specified file's lines
        Parameters:
        file - the file to load
        Returns:
        the lines that were found in the file
        Throws:
        DatabaseIOException - throws a DatabaseIOException when the file couldn't be read
